byline.contributor: Al Baker contributed reporting, and Doris Burke contributed research.
byline.original: By RICK ROJAS and ELI ROSENBERG

abstract: New York City police say Jennifer Berry of Yonkers has been charged with murder for allegedly throwing her newborn girl out seventh-floor window of Bronx apartment.
lead_paragraph: Jennifer Berry of Yonkers was charged with second-degree murder and manslaughter in the death of the infant, who was found with her umbilical cord still attached.

headline.main: Mother Is Accused of Throwing Newborn to Death From 7th-Floor Window in Bronx
headline.print_headline: Mother Is Accused of Throwing Newborn to Death From 7th-Floor Window in Bronx

snippet: Jennifer Berry of Yonkers was charged with second-degree murder and manslaughter in the death of the infant, who was found with her umbilical cord still attached.
